app_description_@chrome@_text.message: Privacy, security, and speed. Control the ExpressVPN app directly from Chrome, spoof your location, and access content anywhere.

app_description_@firefox@_text.message: Privacy, security, and speed. Control the ExpressVPN app directly from Firefox, spoof your location, and access content anywhere.

app_name_title.message: ExpressVPN: VPN proxy to unblock everything

app_short_name_title.description: The short name of the application

error_@chrome@_hide_text.message: Alternatively, you can hide the extension by right-clicking on the icon and selecting “Hide in Chrome menu”.

error_@firefox@_hide_text.message: Alternatively, you can hide the extension by right-clicking on the icon and selecting “Remove from Toolbar” or “Move to menu”.

error_not_activated_text.message: Please sign in to the ExpressVPN desktop app to use this extension.

error_not_activated_LINUX_text.message: Please run this command in your terminal to activate the desktop app:

error_app_not_found_require_LINUX_text.message: This extension requires the ExpressVPN app for Linux with an active subscription.

error_app_not_found_require_LINUX_snap_t.message: If you installed your browser from the Ubuntu Software Center the extension will not be able to communicate with the Linux app. [Learn more]

error_app_not_found_require_MAC_text.message: This extension requires the ExpressVPN app for Mac with an active subscription.

error_app_not_found_require_WINDOWS_text.message: This extension requires the ExpressVPN app for Windows with an active subscription.

error_app_not_found_require_CHROMIUM_tex.message: Please install the ExpressVPN app from the Google Play Store.

error_NOT_INSTALLED_chromeOS_manual.message: If the Play Store isn't available on your Chromebook, please follow our [manual configuration] instructions.

error_business_subscription_expired_cont.message: If you have any questions, please [contact Support].

error_IAP_CONTINUE_USING_p1_text.message: To continue using ExpressVPN, please update the payment details in your iTunes / App Store account.

error_IAP_WILL_AUTO_ACTIVATE_p2_text.message: ExpressVPN will automatically activate within 30 minutes of updating your details.

error_subscription_expiring_p1_text.message: To continue using ExpressVPN, please renew your subscription.

error_subscription_expiring_autobill_p1_.message: To continue using ExpressVPN, please update your payment details.

error_business_subscription_expired_text.message: Please contact the account owner to purchase a new business subscription.

error_compatibility_error_@chrome@_hide_.message: Alternatively, you can hide the extension by right-clicking on the icon and selecting “Hide in Chrome menu”.

error_compatibility_error_@firefox@_hide.message: Alternatively, you can hide the extension by right-clicking on the icon and selecting “Remove from Toolbar” or “Move to menu”.

error_compatibility_error_os_version_p1_.message: This extension is currently only available for macOS 10.10 / Windows 7 and newer.

error_compatibility_error_os_version_p2_.message: Please update your operating system in order to use the extension.

error_connection_error_lock_on_text.message: Internet traffic is currently blocked to protect your privacy.

error_fraudster_hint.message: We couldn’t verify your billing information, so we’ve canceled your payment.

error_fraudster_question1_text.message: Did you pay with a credit card?

error_fraudster_p3_text.message: Please include a photo of the credit card you used (with ONLY the last 4 digits and name exposed)

error_fraudster_question2_text.message: Didn’t pay with a credit card?

error_fraudster_p4_text.message: Please include your phone number (with country code) and the best time we can call you.

error_fraudster_p5_text.message: The Billing Team will respond within 24–48 hours.

error_free_trial_expired_benefits_text.message: Your free trial has expired, but it’s easy to get connected again.

error_open_app_@chrome@_text.message: This extension requires the ExpressVPN app to be running.

error_open_app_@firefox@_text.message: This extension requires the ExpressVPN app to be running.

error_simultaneous_connection_popup_text.message: Opening this link will unblock all internet traffic.

error_simultaneous_connection_p1_text.message: You've exceeded ExpressVPN's device usage limit for this subscription.

error_simultaneous_connection_iap_false_.message: Please disconnect a device or [purchase an additional subscription].

error_subscription_expired_benefits_text.message: Your subscription has expired, but it’s easy to get connected again.

error_subscription_expired_l1_text.message: Access all the content you love

error_upgrade_app_text.message: This extension requires the latest version of the ExpressVPN app.

hint_network_state_captive_portal_text.message: Please sign in to the Wi-Fi network to use the VPN.

hint_network_state_not_sure_ready_text.message: Cannot detect internet connection. VPN may be unavailable.

hint_network_state_not_sure_connecting_t.message: Cannot detect internet connection. VPN will connect when available.

hint_network_state_not_sure_reconnecting.message: Cannot detect internet connection. VPN will connect when available.

hint_network_state_not_ready_text.message: Please wait while your network gets ready.

hint_network_state_no_internet_connectin.message:
Cannot detect internet connection.
VPN will connect when available.

hint_network_state_no_internet_ready_tex.message:
Cannot detect internet connection.
VPN may be unavailable.

hint_network_state_no_internet_reconnect.message:
Internet connection lost.
VPN will reconnect when available.

error_forced_signout_p1_text.message: You have been signed out because your account details were updated.

error_forced_signout_p2_text.message: To continue using ExpressVPN, please sign in again.

error_forced_signout_p2_linux_text.message: To continue using ExpressVPN, please run this command in your terminal to sign in again:

welcome_screen1_p1_text.message: The ExpressVPN extension is a remote control for the desktop app.

welcome_screen2_p1_text.message: When you’re connected to the VPN, it protects your entire device, not just the browser.

welcome_screen3_p1_text.message: The extension spoofs your location, blocks WebRTC, and includes HTTPS Everywhere.

welcome_help_improve_expressvpn_p1_text.message: Share crash reports, speed tests, usability diagnostics, and whether VPN connection attempts succeed. These reports never contain personally identifiable information.

settings_general_help_improve_descriptio.message: Share crash reports, speed tests, usability diagnostics, and whether VPN connection attempts succeed. These reports never contain personally identifiable information.

hint_reconnecting_network_lock_on_text.message: Internet traffic is now blocked to protect your privacy.

hint_no_internet_ready_text.message:
Cannot detect internet connection.
VPN may be unavailable.

hint_no_internet_connecting_text.message:
Cannot detect internet connection.
VPN will connect when available.

hint_no_internet_reconnecting_text.message:
Internet connection lost.
VPN will reconnect when available.

location_picker_search_placeholder_text.message: Search for a city or country

home_change_location_popup_text.message: Your internet traffic may be unsecure during reconnection.

menu_settings_privacy_block_webrtc_descr.message: Prevent websites from discovering your true IP address and location while connected to VPN.

menu_settings_privacy_hide_location_desc.message: Stop HTML5 geolocation from revealing your physical whereabouts while connected to VPN.

menu_settings_privacy_https_everywhere_d.message: Automatically connect to the more-secure HTTPS version of websites where available.

menu_signout_p1_text.message: Are you sure? You will also be signed out of the desktop app.

myaccount_account_active_p1_text.message: Share ExpressVPN and get free service!

myaccount_account_active_p2_text.message: For every friend who signs up, we’ll give you both 30 days free.

notification_extension_update_message.message: Click to see what's new in version %VERSION%

vpn_status_notification_connection_faile.message: Unable to connect to %s. Internet traffic is blocked.

vpn_status_notification_connection_limit.message: Please disconnect a device or purchase an additional subscription.

vpn_status_notification_reconnecting_net.message: Reconnecting to %s. Internet traffic is blocked.

issue_reporter_hint_not_sent_text.message: Unable to send. Please check your connection and try again.

welcome_not_installed_scene_1_text.message: Take control of your privacy and protect your data online

welcome_not_installed_scene_2_text.message: Enjoy your favorite shows and apps wherever you are

welcome_not_installed_scene_3_text.message: Safely connect to public Wi-Fi in hotels, cafés, and airports
